activities: TLXP processes documents into searchable databases on behalf of our clients in support of the discovery process for legal proceedings.  TLXP’s services includes electronic discovery consulting and electronic data discovery.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Data Covered : All data defined as personal from EU
recoursemech: Any individual may refer a privacy issue to TLXP’s Managing Director, Jose Vialet, at jvialet@tlxp.com.  In the event the issue is not resolved, then TLXP will agree to mediate the issue with “BBB EU Safe Harbor”, a third-party dispute resolution service. An individual may file a request for mediation by calling “BBB EU Safe Harbor”at: 703-276-0100. For issues arising outside of the United States, TLXP agrees to mediate issue with the EU’s Data Protection Authorities.
